name: FXC Intelligence
description:
FXC Intelligence is a financial data company specializing in the cross-border payments and ecommerce industries with a focus on pricing data.

Our unique focus on creating and developing the highest grade datasets enables deep, predictive analysis for banks, payments companies, large ecommerce marketplaces, regulators and investors in the FX, card and international payments sector.

With FXC Intelligence’s data, online portal and APIs, our clients rely on our data to find set new strategies, improve margins and grow their businesses.

team.name: Daniel Webber
team.bioHtml: Founder @FXC Intelligence • Studied at @University of Cambridge, @Columbia Business School

team.title: Product Manager
team.name: Cameron Graham
team.bioHtml: Product manager with extensive FinTech and payment experience, but interested and excited about companies across the tech space.

jobs.title: Customer Success Manager
jobs.description:
FXC Intelligence is looking for people with success in account management, customer success and business development to take our industry leading data products in payments and FX to more top tier customers globally. We are a fast growing fintech with a client list of household brands with coverage across leading press such as The Economist.



We sell to banks, payment companies, large corporates and governments. The role requires smart thinking, consultative selling, tenacity and patience.



Responsibilities

- Develop relationship with key members of client organizations.
- Demonstrate an ability to take a client request through from concept to delivery through our interactive portal.
- Demonstrate an ability to manage active accounts, ensure customers remain happy and help drive customer renewals
- Support other senior members of the team in development of new clients (presentations, RFPs, etc.)
 

Requirements

- 2-3 years relevant in account management, customer success or business development experience
- BA or higher level degree
- Excellent written skills including use of powerpoint, excel and word
- Excellent presentation skills and a proven track record of delivery
- Development of best in class client specific research material

jobs.title: Data Analyst
jobs.description:
FXC Intelligence is looking for a Data Analyst to expand our custom data research and analysis related to the payments, FX, cards and financial service industry. We are a fast growing fintech with a client list of household brands with coverage across leading press such as The Economist.

The ideal candidate will use their passion for data and analytics to provide insights to the business covering a range of topics. They will be responsible for conducting both recurring and ad hoc analysis for business users.

Description

- Collaborate with product owners and developers to identify, collect, and transform data for research and analysis
- Understand the day-to-day issues that our business faces, which can be better understood with data
- Identify and diagnose data inconsistencies and errors
- Compile and analyze data related to business issues
- Develop clear visualizations to convey complicated data in a straightforward fashion

Skills

- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Economics, or equivalent quantitative field
- 1 - 2 years' Data Analysis experience
- Proficient in Python and SQL
- Experience in data exploration, profiling, quality control, transformation, and visualization
- Collaborate with product owners and developers to identify, collect, and transform data for research and analysis
- Understand the day-to-day issues that our business faces, which can be better understood with data
- Identify and diagnose data inconsistencies and errors
- Compile and analyze data related to business issues
- Develop clear visualizations to convey complicated data in a straightforward fashion

We are an equal opportunity hirer.

jobs.title: Data Engineer
jobs.description:
As a Data Engineer you will design and develop new batch and real-time data integration feeds using the latest technologies. You will be responsible for the overall design of the solutions you provide.

Responsibilities

Collaborate with product owners and developers to identify, collect and transform data
Optimise existing and develop new data integration workflows
Identify and diagnose data inconsistencies, errors and problems with source data
Responsible for ensuring business critical integration workflows and processes are fit for purpose

Requirements

Experience designing and implementing databases. OLTP, OLAP, data-warehouses
Messaging systems, Kafka, RabbitMQ or similar
Experience developing ETL/ELT workflows (Airflow, Luigi), schedulers, and event-based triggers
Experience working as part of an Agile software development team
Experience using Git, Docker, Jenkins
At least 2 years programming experience using languages such as Python or Java
This is a great opportunity to be part of a large event streaming data platform implementation using the latest technologies including Apache Kafka and a range of database types.

jobs.title: Reporting Analyst
jobs.description:
FXC Intelligence is looking for an enthusiastic Reporting Analyst with a passion for problem-solving, data and visualisations to work alongside out data and product teams. You will be responsible for a variety of work streams including generating insight, data visualisation and product optimisation. To succeed in this role, you need to be creative with both data and visualisations and have a passion for creating things from scratch. 

**Responsibilities**
* Evidence of analytically challenging projects in IT that include SQL query writing and reporting design
* Work to develop reports and analyses using SQL, BI & statistical tools against the data warehouse and the data quality framework
* Monitor, investigate and resolve issues with the ETL and reporting processes
* Oversee the execution of scheduled analyses, reporting and model processes and automate repeat tasks using available SQL & BI tools

**Requirements**
* Strong SQL programming experience
* Good understanding of database design concepts
* Experience performing analysis and developing reports
* Data analytical and problem-solving skills with a focused attention to detail, accuracy, and quality of end-results
* Experience working as part of an Agile software development team
* Data visualisation tools experience: Tableau, Power BI

jobs.title: ETL Developer
jobs.description:
FXC Intelligence is looking for a SQL ETL Developer to join our fast growing London team and help work on our datasets related to the payments, FX, cards and financial service industry. We are a fast growing fintech with a client list of household brands with coverage across leading press such as The Economist.

As an ETL developer you will help to expand the data integration workflows and create data structures as we onboard new data sources into the platform.

**Responsibilities**

* Collaborate with product owners and developers to identify, collect and transform data
* Optimise existing and develop new data integration workflows
* Identify and diagnose data inconsistencies, errors and problems with source data
* Contribute to standards and best practices
* Responsible for ensuring business critical integration workflows and processes are fit for purpose

**Requirements**

* Strong SQL programming experience (SQL, Stored Procs etc.)
* Experience designing data warehouse and analytical data marts (Good understanding of Kimball & Inmon would be ideal)
* Experience developing ETL/ELT workflows, schedulers, and event-based triggers
* Experience working with ETL workflow tools such as SSIS or Apache Airflow
* Experience working as part of an Agile software development team
* Data Architecture
* ETL & SQL Development
* Data Quality and Availability
